predictions.text: No U.S. federal government shutdown will begin at 00:01 EDT on 2025-10-01 because a continuing resolution or full-year appropriations will be enacted into law by that time.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify that a CR or appropriations bill is signed into law and published (e.g., Congress.gov/WhiteHouse.gov) before 2025-10-01 00:01 EDT. If funding lapses and OMB issues a shutdown memo, this is false.
monitoring_signals: House/Senate floor schedules and vote counts
Text of CR/appropriations bills and enrollment status on Congress.gov
White House statements/signing schedule
OMB contingency/shutdown guidance updates
predictions.rationale: Leadership signaling pragmatic compromise; short-window CR is the path of least resistance to avoid blame and market turmoil.

predictions.text: Tesla (TSLA) Q3 2025 global deliveries will be between 415,000 and 460,000 vehicles in the company’s press release published by 2025-10-04.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Tesla’s official Q3 2025 production and deliveries press release on ir.tesla.com. The reported deliveries figure must fall within [415,000, 460,000].
monitoring_signals: Weekly China insurance registrations for Tesla
Export ship tracking from Shanghai and Berlin
U.S./Europe inventory tracker data
Recent price cuts/incentives and order lead times
predictions.rationale: Seasonality plus stabilized production; mixed demand signals suggest a mid-400k outcome.

predictions.text: UK CPI (headline, YoY) for September 2025 will print between 2.8% and 3.3% in the ONS release due 2025-10-16.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm the September 2025 headline CPI year-over-year rate in the ONS CPI release on 2025-10-16. Value must be within [2.8%, 3.3%].
monitoring_signals: UK energy prices and Ofgem cap effects
Wage growth and services inflation indicators
GBP exchange rate impacts on import prices
Retail discounting and supermarket price surveys
predictions.rationale: Disinflation trend continues with energy base effects; services sticky but easing slowly.

predictions.text: U.S. CPI shelter index (month-over-month, seasonally adjusted) for September 2025 will print between 0.30% and 0.45% in the BLS CPI release on 2025-10-10.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check BLS CPI Detailed Report (Table 1/Section on Shelter). September 2025 shelter MoM SA must be within [0.30%, 0.45%].
monitoring_signals: New lease rent indexes (ZORI, Apartment List)
Owner’s equivalent rent and primary rent diffusion in CPI microdata
Vacancy rates and lease renewal spreads
Lagged relationship between private rent indices and CPI shelter
predictions.rationale: Private rent indices imply gradual disinflation but shelter remains elevated due to lagged OER.

predictions.text: U.S. working natural gas in storage will reach at or above 3.80 trillion cubic feet in at least one EIA Weekly Natural Gas Storage Report published by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use EIA Weekly Natural Gas Storage Report. Any published total U.S. working gas level at or above 3,800 Bcf by the 2025-11-15 report qualifies.
monitoring_signals: Weekly injection magnitudes vs 5-year average
Production levels and pipeline maintenance
LNG feedgas demand and export terminal outages
Cooling/heating degree days forecasts
predictions.rationale: Above-average inventories and robust production support reaching high end-of-shoulder-season levels.

predictions.text: LME 3-month Copper official settlement price will reach at or above $9,500 per metric ton on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via LME daily official prices: 3-month Copper cash/official settlement at or above $9,500/t on any trading day through 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: China property stimulus and infrastructure spend
Exchange inventories (LME/SHFE) and time spreads
USD DXY movements
Global PMIs and electrical/renewables demand
predictions.rationale: Tight concentrates, energy transition demand, and potential China policy support can lift prices.

predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will close at or above $75,000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Yahoo Finance BTC-USD daily close (UTC). Any daily close ≥ $75,000 by 2025-11-30 qualifies.
monitoring_signals: U.S. spot ETF net flows and AUM
Real yields and DXY
Risk appetite and tech/crypto beta performance
On-chain activity and stablecoin net issuance
predictions.rationale: ETF flows and easing financial conditions could drive a breakout, but volatility warrants sub-50% odds.

predictions.text: The U.S. 30Y–5Y Treasury yield spread (FRED: DGS30 minus DGS5) will close at or above 0.60 percentage points on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: From FRED daily series DGS30 and DGS5, compute DGS30 − DGS5. Any daily close ≥ 0.60 pp through 2025-11-30 qualifies.
monitoring_signals: Fed rate-cut expectations and forward guidance
Inflation breakevens and term premium estimates
Treasury supply/auction outcomes
Growth data (ISM, payrolls) affecting curve steepening
predictions.rationale: Prospective Fed easing with resilient growth can steepen the curve via front-end decline and term premium stabilization.

predictions.text: The Drewry World Container Index Shanghai–Los Angeles weekly spot rate published on or before 2025-10-31 will be at least 15% higher than its 2025-09-05 reading.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare Drewry WCI Shanghai–Los Angeles rate on 2025-09-05 versus any weekly print up to and including 2025-10-31. A rise ≥ 15% qualifies.
monitoring_signals: Blank sailings and capacity management announcements
Port congestion metrics (LA/LB) and dwell times
U.S. import demand/retail restocking indicators
Bunker fuel prices and Panama/Suez constraints
predictions.rationale: Capacity discipline and seasonal restocking support higher Transpac spot rates near term.

predictions.text: Alphabet (GOOGL) Q3 2025 revenue will be between $83.0B and $87.0B, per the company’s earnings release published by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Alphabet’s Q3 2025 press release/10-Q. Total revenue must fall within [$83.0B, $87.0B].
monitoring_signals: Digital ad spend trackers (Search/YouTube)
YouTube RPMs and engagement trends
Google Cloud bookings and profitability trajectory
FX impact (USD strength) on international revenue
predictions.rationale: Search and YouTube stabilize with improving ad budgets; Cloud growth remains solid.
